objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

div.head: {@śalya parba@}
{@sūcīpatra<lb/>śalya paboṅg<lb/>biṣaẏa pr̥ṣṭhāṅka@}

lg.l: 1| śalyaṅkara senāpatitve baraṇa, śakuni sahita<lb/>sahadebaṅkara yuddha, śakunira mr̥tyu, śalyaṅka saha<lb/>yudhiṣṭhiraṅka yuddha o śalyaṅkara mr̥tyu .... 1
2| kr̥pāchāryyaṅkara senāpatitve baraṇa, arjunaṅka<lb/>sahita yuddha o mr̥tyu, bāṇaṅka dvārā punarjībana<lb/>lābha ... ... ... 18

div.head: {@sāraḷā mahābhārata<lb/>śalya parba<lb/>śalyaṅkara senāpatitve baraṇa, śakuni sahita<lb/>sahadebara yuddha, śakunira mr̥tyu<lb/>śalyaṅka saha yudhiṣṭhiraṅka yuddha<lb/>o<lb/>śalyaṅkara mr̥tyu@}

lg.l: jaẏatu jaẏa durgā māgo jaẏa māheśvarī
aṣṭābhaśa paboṅg yuddha śeṣara ye kathā
bho śalya rājā buḍilā moho rajya
bidura bacana na kari dhr̥taraṣṭra pāilā akāryya | 5 |
aputrika hoithilu rājā tora śateputra ye hoilā | 6 |
hāthe pada pāẏe padma ẏe sādhika nabasr̥ṣṭi | 7 |
aneka mahimā ẏehāra na sarai kahante
baṁśa buḍāiba tohora ẏe putra thāānte | 8 |
ẏekā ẏe putraku māri aneśvata putra rakha
nikaṭe sukha pāile pachānte pāibuṭi dukha | 9 |
ẏeḍe sustha hoiṇa se aputrika kiṁpā ẏe śāsti pāāntā | 10 |
bidura bacana ye na kalā dhr̥tarāṣṭra
kāḷe phaḷilā ẏebe pāilā ẏeḍe kaṣṭa | 11 |
mānagobinda bolai, dhr̥tarāṣṭra baṁśa nāśagala hāde
yehne karma acchi tohora nimante yuddha kari | 13 |
daṇḍa sāji caḷile ye rāẏegurū śalye
samadaṇḍa gheni mantrī śakuni tāra tule | 14 |

div.note: ẏeḍe sampada harāi kiṁpe ẏeḍe śāsti pāāntā |(ca, cha, gha, ṇa)
dekhiṇa rāẏeguru śalya kaleka mahātrāsa |(ca, ja, ta)

lg.l: daẏā na kala tumbhe nakuḷa sahadeba duhinti
śalya boile tu bābure parama kalyāṇa hoasi
āmbhara āṣya gheni tu sarbadā brati thāasi | 24 |
bābu bāḷakāḷuṁ baḍhilu ye dhr̥tarāṣṭra koḷe
kṣatriẏa kuḷaku hāde nohai ẏesaneka karma | 26 |
āja abaśya tumbhanta samare karibu prāṇe badha | 27 |

div.note: pitāra aprīti pare ‘ja’ re adhikā pada :–
tumbhe ẏebe yuddhaku aila ki kāraṇe
baṁśahiṁ buḍiba nāśayiba ye āpaṇe |
karṇṇa paḍilā mātuḷa yaśa acchi tumbhari<lb/>śākalyadeśakaiṁ yāa apasari |(ka, ṇa, ba, ḍha, cha)
ẏetebeḷeheṁ yogāile karibā tumbhe sanddha |(ka, ba, ñja, ña, ṅa)

lg.l: puṇa puṇa binoẏī ye bolai phālaguni
mātāra sodara hoi māmuṁhe na ghenila mohara daẏinī | 29 |
tumbhe āmbhanta jiṇile teṇe nāhiṁ yaśa
samre binddhalā se bhārathe bhāroi malla | 33 |
puṇa śateka nārāja pūroi śateka mahārathī
ẏegāra bāṇa pūroi tāhā binddhalā arjuna | 36 |

div.note: pada pare ‘ja, ṅa, ta, tha’ pothimānaṅkare adhikā pāṭha–
śalyaṁka nārājamāna pakāilā chedi
dekhiṇa tabada helā śalya mahāyodhī ||
guṇare basāi dhanu ṭāṇante āmāñchi
pāñchabāṇa binddhaṇa tāhā ye chedile sarbasācī |
puṇa dhanu āmañchi binddhalā bāhubaḷe
candrābaḷī nārāje chedilā paṇḍubāḷe |

lg.l: agniśara kopeṇa ye śalya tahuṁ peṣi
kuhuḍi nārāja ye binddhalā śalya rathī
kuhuḍi phāṭigalā ye sūryara teja lāgi
puṇa śateka śara ye binddhale śalya begi | 43 |
bajrābaḷī nārāja tahuṁ kope śalya peṣi
āsanti nārāja ye ghora garjana kari
paśupatra bāṇe tāhā chedile pātha bīra | 49 |
kehi ocha nuhanti se doheṁ samachatrī | 50 |
ati byagra kariṇa se bindhai mahārāge
śūnya hātha hoiṇa rahile rāẏe śalya
śakunira kare pañchāśa sahasra baḷa dhanu
sahadeba boilā māmuṁ paraku tohora buddha
pare upagāra kari āpaṇe puṇa naśu
sugyānī puruṣa tuho sāṁgrāme kiṁke paśu | 58 |
mohora ghcamure paḍi tumbhe ki jīimba | 59 |
ẏekā nārājake sahadeba tāhā pakāilā kāṭi | 61 |
madanāra nandana ye beḷe beḷe niprohi
śakuni mantrīra tule sahadeba samara karai rahi | 63 |
sanddhalā lāghaba śare yujhanti beni rathī
gata āgata se jāṇanti samare mahāgyāṁtā
abikṣaṇe nārāja se bindhanti samare śakatā | 65 |
ākarṣi beni bīre pabanuṁ bege chedi | 67 |
āho caitana rathīki rathī ye puṇi hāthīkaiṁ hāthī
aśvakaiṁ aśva ye pādānti ki pādānti | 68 |
ẏekaku āreka se kehi nohanti ūṇā
śare śara patitāḷa na yāi gaṇanā | 69 |
bāruṇā śareka ye śakuni bege peṣi
puṇa śakuni ye chāriśata bāṇa binddha
parbatā śahasre ka ye binddhalā kurumantrī
antarīkṣe aśva ratha chedilā śakunira chāba | 75 |

div.note: pada pare ‘ṭha’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
puṇa kāḷasarpa bāṇa peṣilā śakuni
garuḍāstre nibārile sahadeba mantrī |(ṭa, ṇa)
puṇa pañchāśa bāṇa śakuni ye binddha |(ta, tha, gha, ṅa, ja)

lg.l: ghāẏeṇa ghumāi ye paḍilā paḍilā mattahāthī
phaḷā khaṇḍā gheni mantrī helāka pādagati | 79 |
bulāiṇa kunta ye pabanuṁ bege uṭhi

div.note: nidīghara = maḷadvāra |
benibhmaja ātreṣiṇa caḷai siṁghaṭhāṇi |(ka, ba, ṇa, ca, ṭa)
sahadeba manu nāme sārathiki māilā bege jāṭhi |(ṇa, ca, ka)
beni mutha uñchāi se dhāmaiṁ bahana |(ta, ba, cha, tha)

lg.l: ẏebe se pāsora galā mohora putraṁkara kaṣṭa | 89 |
prathama samare śakuni yebe paḍithāntā raṇe
ubhaẏa kuḷaku ẏe buḍāilā ẏekā jaṇe | 90 |
yauṁ dinu śakuni mantrīpaṇe asthāne basilā
ẏeka ātmā kuru pāṇḍebanta benibāḍa karāilā | 91 |
śakuni nidhana śuṇi māna ye gobinda
āhā daiba boli kapāḷe kara dhinda | 93 |
arjili bipuḷa bhoga māmuṁ tohora parasāde | 94 |
kahante na sarai māmuṁ tohora mantrīpaṇa
ẏeḍe subuddhi hoi kiṁke paśilu yāiṁ raṇa | 95 |
ābara raṇe jiṇi māmuṁ muiṁ kisa karibi
ẏe mohora satya satya āja sāṁgrāme jhāsa debi | 97 |
lacheka yoddhā tule āsuachanti ye ghoṭi | 98 |

div.note: ohobaḷa kuḷa kiṁpā buḍante akāraṇa |(ta, tha, ñja, da, ṅa)
kara dhinda = hasta dvanda |

lg.l: kareṇa dhanuśara ye ādrābaḷī teja jāṇi
mana pabanahuṁ bege karanti śara br̥ṣṭi
gaja piṭhiru ḍeiṁ paḍile dharmarāẏe yujheṣṭhi | 109 |
dhanu ādhyāna kari se ye binddhalā gāndhārīra tanu
yujheṣṭhiṁkara śara paḍi chaḍilā tāra dhanu | 111 |
dhanu dhari śahasra binddhale yujheṣṭhi mahīpāḷe
nārāja paḍilā yāiṁ managobinda mattahāthīra bakṣasthaḷe | 112 |

div.note: timburu śareka puroi ye binddhalā dhr̥tirāṣṭri |(ṅa, ta, ba, ḍha)

lg.l: gaja piṭhiru paḍi rāẏe hoilā pādagati | 113 |
driyodhana dhāmaiṁ saturi saturi bhāra beni gadā gheni | 115 |
hanumanta boilā pārtha birathī hoicchi yujheṣṭhi
nandighoṣa ratha pachakati āsi hoile yujheṣṭhi
birāḷacandra boli hārthaẏe raẏe tāhāra upareṇa uṭhi | 119 |
ajaṅgama sārikṣe dhanu rāẏe dhaile śrīhaste
dekhiṇa beḍhile aneka ye sanyabaḷa āsi

div.note: bāṇajāḷe dagdha hoilā ye sainyaṅkara kāẏe |(ṅa, ta, ja)

lg.l: atyanta pabanabaḷe ye ẏe kadalī banaloṭi
bhājile saini ye na rahile kehi āga
saini khedi nianti ẏekā kehi nāhānti tule
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku śalye āborile bāhānada kari | 128 |
ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe nāhiṁ dhanu ke dharantā | 129 |
tāhāra chamure yāiṁ bije kale yujheṣṭhi | 131 |
gaja dekhi keśarī yesane hoẏe roṣa
āho kare dhanu dhariṇa achanti dharmarāẏe yujheṣṭhi
śalye abicchanne bāṇa kaleka ye br̥ṣṭi | 133 |
na ghuñchanti samare ye dharmara nandana

div.note: bīrasenara nandana śalya saẏaḷa janajitā |(ṭa, ṇa)

lg.l: kopeṇa śalya ye binddhale nārāja tīkṣamūnā
bajrasenhā phuṭiṇa se gaja kumbhastaḷe galā gaḷi
śalyaṁka rathe padi ratha hoilā bhaganasta | 142 |
puṇa pañchuśara gheni śalyaṁka hr̥de bhedī | 143 |
tīkṣa nārājeka gheni binddhale rāẏeguru śalya | 145 |
paḍilā nārāja ye nirāpakṣa agni jāṇi
śūnya hātha hoiṇa ye dharmaṁkara baḷā

div.note: “ālāśeṇa thāi ye dekhanti br̥ndāarka” pādānta pare :–
śalyara śahasramāna bhagna hoithile tahiṁ
aṅguḷire dhanu kale guṇeka basāi |(ta, ṭa, ja)
giri prasrabaṇa sama rudhira nikiḷi |(kha, ṭha)

lg.l: triẏambeka nārāja ye gheniṇa śalya mahārathī
dhāmanti śailye ye teje atīẏa achārgaḷā | 150 |
chāpoḍe śalye yujheṣṭhiṁku nei kaleka prahāra | 152 |
rome rome rudhira gaḷai ye phuṭi
mahā kāḷānaḷa jāṇi byāpita yehne cachu
chāḍa chaḍa mātuḷa kete kaṭāḷa karuachu | 156 |
ātmā baikulya mohora dahai barṇṇānaḷa troṭa anaḷa
rudra kāḷānaḷa prāẏe birājai benicachu ḍoḷa | 157 |
kāmadahana kāḷe yehne rudra cachu anaḷa
ẏe kopānaḷe chāhiṁle dahana hoibe tridaśe | 159 |
kāḷacatra prāẏe se bulai beni naẏana | 160 |

div.note: cachu = cakṣubā ākṣi |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi debe boile māmuṁ jaḷilā jaḷilā
gobinde boile bābu raha raha bīra bhīma
ẏe ante saṁjaẏa ye gale dhātikāre
sakhā sodara na dekhi se hoilā tāṭakā | 170 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭra boile tumbhe bidura duheṁ yāiṁ
andhāra beḷe tāku āṇa yā neuṭai | 171 |
sañjaẏe boile āsibāku āra kāhiṁ bāṭa
kareṇa śahasra thile bhaẏe karanti ghobinda | 174 |
tāhāṁka kopānaḷe dahiya hoilā śalyaṁkara kāẏe | 175 |
mānadhātāra dui lakṣa tini ahibrata naaśa nauaṁke
ẏemāne bidyā śikhanti indrapraśaste yamunā nadītīre
suranadī dakṣiṇa tīre bije karichanti bhāgyabare
tiniyūṇa prati pāñcha yojana tā sthaḷī
bhāgyabara boile phimpiśara māra ẏe parbata yāu gali | 182 |
prathame bhīṣme aṅguṣṭhi chāpi māile phimpigoṭi
parbate paḍi beni yojana galā phuṭi | 183 |

div.note: phimpi = yeuñ śaraku nikṣepa karāyāe |
duje = dutīẏare
tije = tr̥tīẏare

lg.l: pāñchayojana āẏatana parbata galā ye nikiḷi | 187 |
bhairobī bidāraṇe se agni koṇe bhedi | 188 |
se nadīra tīre aṇaṣṭaka nāme ruṣi
naba sahasra baraṣa se tapa karai basi | 189 |
ḍāhāṇa pañjarāre paḍi bāma pañjarāre nikiḷilā | 190 |
dhāiṁ yāiṁ hoile se bhāgyabara sahite | 192 |
aṇaṣṭaka ruṣi boile ho mohora śarīra byākuḷu
ye mote adoṣe ẏehā kalā śarīra tāhāra jaḷu | 193 |
ruṣikaiṁ praṇapatya hoile śalya rakha mahāprahu
se boile mahābhāratha yuddhe yujheṣṭhideba tote | 194 |
aṇaṣṭaka mahāruṣira śāpye śalyara deha naṣṭa | 195 |
sāraḷā smaraṇe bhāṣe śūdramuni śrī sāroḷā dāsa | 197 |

div.note: aguḷi = āgei bā bahaki yibā |
aṇaṣṭka = anuṣṭupa ruṣi
div.head: {@kr̥pāchāryyaṅkara senāpatitve baraṇa<lb/>arjunaṅka sahita yuddha o mr̥tyu,<lb/>bāṇaṅka dvārā punarjībana lābha@}

lg.l: bho muni taba mukhuṁ śuṇi śalyapaboṅgra bāratā
kr̥pākari ẏebe mote kaha he agasti
śalya badha uttāreṇa hoilā kisa rīti | 4 |
aśva gaja ratha ye paḍile pādānti
trodha abasthā hoiṇa nr̥patira aśr̥jaḷa beniākhi
boile harāili sampada muni he hoili nirīmākhi | 8 |
kr̥pa boile tuho trodha chaḍa nr̥pati
rahi yuddha dekha muṁ hoili senāpati | 9 |
driyodhana boilā āchāryye ho kāhiṁ mohora bharasā
samasta buḍāili āu mohora sampade kisa āśā | 10 |
marāili sabunti mora nāhiṁ sākhā suhr̥de
saṁhāthe arjili mūni he ẏeḍeka paramāde | 11 |
badaẏanti āchāryye rājā senāpati kara mote | 12 |
āryya, ẏe hāthare mora yete lokaku dili arghya
jaṇe kehi na bratile samaste paḍile raṇayagyaṁ | 14 |
āu kāhākaiṁ āśa na kalu guru āmbhe | 15 |
pāṇḍabanta nāśane se kāryya kāraṇa hoiba tote | 17 |
aneka bīra tūra śabada gahaḷa bāje
saini gheni kr̥pe sāṁgrāme yāiṁ bije | 19 |
parama gurutulya mātuḷa tumbhe samare kiṁke uṭhi | 20 |
tumbhe kiṁpe dvande paśila kisa praẏojana acchi | 22 |
droṇa yebe nāśagale tumbhanta kisa ye oprodhe
japa tape paśa yāiṁ tumbhara kisa kāryya yuddhe | 23 |

div.note: pāṇḍabanta nāśane se kāryya kāraṇa hoiba mote |(cha, ja, tha, kha, gha, ḍha)
sāṁgrāmaku bāhāra hoile yati cūḍāmaṇi |(ḍha, ba, ña)

lg.l: chatrī hoi kahibāku kimpe ẏehā na bujhilu lāja | 24 |
kr̥pe boile hārilā yuddhe ye roṣa acchi
ẏethiki boli apayaśa ye nāhiṁ kicchi | 25 |
sambhāḷa sambhāḷa arjuna ho bindhu acchi bāṇa
kahuṁ kahuṁ roṣita se bhārata pañchāṇa | 26 |
śrībhmaje śobhābana kr̥paṁkara ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra baḷa dhanu
sambhāḷa sambhāḷa arjuna boli bolanti catrapāṇi | 32 |
se śahasra sahibāku tohora kisa darpa | 33 |
arjuna boilā svāmi tu aśva rathanta mātra thāasi sambhāḷi
tohora prasāde hāde kiñchita prāẏe maṇai banamāḷī | 34 |
dekha dekha boli ye nārāja bindhai kirīṭī

div.note: kr̥pe boile hāribā jiṇimā dui ẏeta kṣatrīṅkara acchi |<lb/>ẏethaku yaśa apayaśa na ghenimā kicchi |(ta, tha, ṅa, gha, ña, kha)

lg.l: puṇa kr̥pe pañchaśata nārāja bege binddha | 36 |
pañchadaśa nārāja binddhale kr̥pa kr̥ṣṇa arjuna upare
tiriśi tiriśi nārāje samasta chedai bahana | 39 |
pañchastarī nārāje arjuna tāhā pakāile hāṇi | 40 |
ẏeka cchidrake na chaḍanti deḍhaprahara hoilā rātra | 41 |
kope kr̥pa āchāryye parigha śara gheni
chaḍaye jaan pariyante śahasraṁka teja byāpe | 45 |
puṇa agni bāṇa ye binddhale kr̥paāchāryye
meghāśahasra arjuna sandhāna kalāka ye nije | 47 |
ẏe lāghaba yuddha kale raẏaṇī prānta heba | 51 |
boilu aṣṭādaśa dibase deba karibi sabu kṣaẏe | 52 |
ẏe tohora kalā kr̥tya hoiba ki āna
brahmahatyā doṣaku bhaẏa karai deba catrapāṇi | 54 |
droṇa prāẏe guru puruṣa se yebe hoile śiracchede | 55 |
ẏehāṁku yebe tuhi brāhmaṇa boli jāṇu
kemante raṇe paśilu gheni śara dhanu | 57 |
svāmi antadoṣa pāteka khaṇḍibāku tuhi se śirīpati | 58 |
gobinde boile pātha bege bindhu kinā bāṇa

div.note: tahiṁki rahamāna pāṇḍaba sundara |(ba, ḍha, cha, gha)
brahmahatyā pātakaku ghuñchāiba catrapāṇi |(ṭa, ṇa)
kr̥pa āchāryye aṭanti tāhāṅkara anu<lb/>ẏehāku oprodha kale saṁkalpa kiṁpe ghenuṁ |(ṭa, ṭha, ca, ña, ṇa)

lg.l: kr̥paku na jiṇile tumbhe hārila ninā yuddhe | 61 |
bīruḍāśare kr̥pe ta ku pakāile kāṭi | 65 |
nīḷabāṇa bhmajabaṇa se arjunara troṇe thile beni
karṇṇa tahuṁ āṇithile yāhā bhojara nandinī | 67 |
kāhākuhiṁ arjuna binddha na thila se śara
kāḷa ntaka nārāja se aṭanti harihara | 68 |
arjuna boilā ẏebe ẏe śara duheṁ yāntu

div.note: ohobaḷara = ubhaẏa sainyamāṅkara |
bajrāśare kr̥pāchāryye kale tā chedana pādānta pare<lb/>‘ṭha’ re adhikā pāṭha :–
arjuna yeteka bāṇa kopare bindhanti
pratiśare kr̥pāchāryya tā chedi pakābanti |
jiṇī na pārile pātha kr̥paṁku kāhiṁre
bichārile māribi muṁ āja debaśare |

lg.l: koṭiẏe kiraṇa gheni nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa beni
bindhante raśmi ye ghoṭilā brahmāṇḍa bhmabanatini | 71 |
trailokya kampile ye harihara śara āsante | 72 |
garjiṇa aile se beni ye nārāje
chāmure prabeśa āsi kr̥pa ye āchāryye | 73 |
kr̥paṁkara haẏa sārathi ratha samaste hoile dahija | 74 |
kemante nāśa karibā ẏeḍebaḍa bitakṣaṇa brāhmaṇaṅku | 76 |
ẏeḍe dhārmika hoi horaṇe paśilu kimbhūta kāraṇa | 78 |
samara śeṣe peṣilā āmbha ye duhinti | 79 |
āho arajuna yemante peṣantā prathama samare
kṣaṇake chedantā nā kauroba sanya bīre | 80 |
āho kr̥pāchāryye tote āmbhe baḍa yoddhāboli maṇuṁ
brahmaṇa boli tote ādihuṁ na jāṇuṁ | 81 |

div.note: darpa tohora dagadha mūrtti dekhi byasaṁkara nāti<lb/>śeṣa samare ho peṣilā āmbha ye duhinti |(ṭa, ṇa, ña)

lg.l: āmbhara ẏe samaraku tuho kisa kṣama
biśeṣe brāhmaṇa tu tote mārante adharma | 82 |
āmbhar atule tora nārāja bindha bābu
arjuna pache kopakaru āmbhe bāhuḍiṇa yibu | 83 |
dekhu dekhu māribu kemante ẏeḍeka brāhmaṇa | 84 |
kr̥pe boile tumbhe harihara beni aṭa
tumbhaṁku pratikaccha śara nāhiṁ nā pālaṭa | 85 |
tumbhara tule mohora kisa ye sāṁgrāma | 86 |
nīḷabāṇa boilā apālaṭaka śara aṭu āmbhe
kehi kiṁcita loke na piṣile āmbhaṁku
abaśya śiracchedana karibu brahmā rudra candra sūryyaṁku | 88 |
ẏeḍebaḍa mahābhāratha samare ghāntiẏeka na peṣi
ẏeteboli beni śare ye paḍile upare
arjunara dekhante kr̥para pakāile muṇḍa hāṇi
kr̥paṁkara tule thile ye tinilakṣa rathī
nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa duheṁ chedile sabunti tatakṣaṇānti | 92 |
kr̥pa āchāryyaṁku māilu dekhile kr̥ṣṇa pālaguni | 95 |
ẏebe jīāiṁ debā phaṭu āmbhara mahāpāpa | 96 |
nīḷabāṇa boilā piṭhi katiki karibā mukha
ārabeḷe jāṇimā nā samara keḍe sukha | 98 |
kr̥para badana ye kale piṭhi katiki
mr̥tu sañjibanī dei uṭha boliṇa ḍāki | 99 |
śarīre prāṇa pāi se uṭhile kr̥pāchāryye | 100 |
ārabeḷe samare na paśibuṭi diśilu parapañcha rūpa | 101 |
paḷābanti kr̥pa āchāryye piṭhi katiki dr̥ṣṭi
bāṇe bolanti pāṇḍabe tora yemante na pābanti leśa
agamyabane yahiṁ tahiṁ gupata hoi paśa | 103 |
ye yāhā bhmabane se paśile sārikṣe | 105 |
ananta rūpa dhari sakaḷa brahmaṇḍa byapī | 106 |
harihara beni ẏeka ātmā ye bolanti svargabāsī | 107 |

div.note: ārabeḷe samare paśile pāibaṭi pāpa |(ṇa, ja, ṅa, ḍha)
araṇye lucile se śveta nadīkūḷa |(ja, tha)
jagannātha yogeśvara jaẏa debakāśī |(cha, ṇa, ca)

lg.l: śuddha saṣṭika nīḷa pīta śuddha ye sampūrṇṇe | 108 |
pinākī sāraṅga dhanu catra triśūḷa goṭi | 109 |
śrībhmaje kambu śabada ḍambaru ye bāji
timiri bidāraṇa nātha yāhāra nāma kr̥ṣṇa
kāḷakūṭa bahana kari yāhāra nāma nīḷakaṇṭha | 114 |
svāmi bhagatajana tāraṇa tuhi se śaraṇamatsaḷā
beni ātmā ẏekakāẏe kr̥ṣṇa ye dhabaḷā | 116 |
ẏe bhaba sāgarū uddhara śaṁkara nārāẏaṇa | 119 |
svāmi ẏe bhaba sāgara ye anīti saṁsāra

div.note: timiri bidāraṇa nātha yāhāra nāma biṣṇu<lb/>kāḷakūṭa biṣa niśodhana nāma to sītāṁśu |(ta, dha, ṅa, ja)

lg.l: ẏeka deba nāukā āreka deba keruāḷa | 121 |
bhāsanteṇa ẏe bhaba saṁsāre tuhi se nāukā
sadā sarbadāẏe āsana yāhāra dhīrajana hr̥de
badaẏanti śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa janme janme kali āśā | 125 | 320 |

div.note: ẏeka deba nāukā āreka deba kaṇḍoẏāra |(ṅa, ta, cha)
sadā sarbadā niścaḷa āsana yāhāra<lb/>dhīrajanamāne ṭhāba kara āpaṇā śarīra |<lb/>yamadaṇḍuṁ uddhāra nātha tohora parasāde<lb/>ẏe anitya saṁsāru mote pārakara hāde |(ja, ta, tha, ṅa)ra bhinma pāṭha
‘kali āśā’ pādānta pare pothimānaṅkare prakṣipta padamāna<lb/>paridr̥ṣṭa hue |
